column4: you guys think its safe to upgrade 11.04 to 11.10? OR should it be a fresh install
The upgrade process is pretty safe, as a rule, but you might as well make a backup anyway, as you'd have to for a reinstall - just in case.  It's highly unlikely you'll have any major issues.
11.10 allows choosing the gnome desktop, AIUI, but not gnome2, since it's no longer supported.
